meanings.definition: A plain block or plinth serving as a support for a statue or column.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed ancient statues on sturdy socles.
meanings.sent2: The artist carefully placed the sculpture on its socles.
meanings.sent3: The socles decided to have a party for the statues.
meanings.sent4: The socles of knowledge held up the pillars of wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The socles stood like loyal guards beneath the statues.

meanings.definition: A projecting base or plinth at the foot of a wall or column.
meanings.sent1: The building had decorative socles at its corners.
meanings.sent2: The architect added socles to enhance the structure's appearance.
meanings.sent3: The socles played hide-and-seek with the walls.
meanings.sent4: The socles anchored the building like roots of a tree.
meanings.sent5: The socles seemed to whisper secrets to the walls.
